headline: Global Payments (GPN): Evaluating Valuation After Board Reshuffle and Strategic Integration Moves
summary: Global Payments has drawn attention after appointing Patricia Watson and Archana Deskus as independent board directors in collaboration with Elliott Investment Management. Both bring deep technology and fintech backgrounds, which signals a shift in strategic oversight within the company. See our latest analysis for Global Payments. With those leadership changes and the pending Worldpay acquisition in focus, investors have watched Global Payments closely. While recent news has sparked renewed...

headline: The UK Competition and Markets Authority Launches a Phase 1 Investigation into Global Payments Inc. (GPN)’s Proposed Acquisition of Worldpay
summary: With significant upside potential, Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) secures a spot on our list of the 20 NYSE Stocks with the Lowest P/E Ratios. The UK Competition and Markets Authority launched a Phase 1 investigation into Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN)’s proposed purchase of Worldpay on September 17, 2025, prompting Keefe, Bruyette & Woods to reiterate […]
